structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The governing body of any city may classify sewer users upon any reasonable basis and may establish different service rates for each class, provided such rates are uniform as to all sewer users in the same class. Such classifications may be of limited or indefinite duration.
law.history: Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 4, effective June 19, 1958.
